title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6173.4 - Reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6173.4 - Reports

State Regulations
(a) A provider
agency receiving funds pursuant to this Part shall provide to the division a
quarterly report which shall include, at a minimum: (1)
the number of livery vehicle drivers
served; (2)
the nature of the
program services provided; and
(3)
the costs of the program services provided. (b) A provider agency receiving funds
pursuant to this Part shall provide to the division a final written report
within 30 days after the conclusion of program services which shall include, at
a minimum: (1)
a description of how the
services provided enhanced livery vehicle safety; and
(2)
the nature and costs of program services
provided. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6173.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
